I'm trying to run the precompiled heritrix-1.0.4.zip on (gasp!)
Windows XP and am running into problems riht from the getgo.

From the command prompt I type:


---------------------------------------------------------
set HERITRIX_HOME=C:\heritrix
set
CLASSPATH=%HERITRIX_HOME%\lib\ant-1.5.4.jar;%HERIT

IX_HOME%\lib\t.jar;%HERITRIX_HOME%\heritrix-1.0.4.jar;


%JAVA_HOME%\bin\java -D org.archive.crawler.Heritrix


---------------------------------------------------------



And get 

Exception in thread "main" java.io.IOException: Cannot find subdir:
conf
        at org.archive.crawler.Heritrix.getSubDir(Heritrix.java:297)
        at org.archive.crawler.Heritrix.initialize(Heritrix.java:270)
        at org.archive.crawler.Heritrix.main(Heritrix.java:221)





Any suggestions?


Thanks,

Daniel
